Title: XXI.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Jonathan E. Steinberg, Dan Shotz, Marc Berzenski (staff writer), Lisa Schultz Boyd (staff writer), Joshua Rothenberger (staff writer)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: The conflict between Flint and Silver escalates as starvation and dehydration set in; Woodes and Eleanor arrive to troubling circumstances in Nassau; Blackbeard takes charge of an uncertain situation on the island.
